cause.description:
Advancing the Common Good
United Way of Central Ohio is working to advance the common good by focusing on the building blocks for a good life: a quality education that leads to a productive career, enough income to support a family through retirement, good health, and a safe place to live.
Join us. Invest your money, use your voice, and volunteer your time to advance the common good for all of us.
1. GIVE - Giving to our Community Impact Fund is the easiest and most powerful way to improve lives and build a better community.
2. ADVOCATE - You can make change happen with your voice.
3. VOLUNTEER - Volunteer your time to make a difference in peoples's lives in central Ohio.
cause.mission: To improve the lives of others by mobilizing the caring power of our community.
cause.name: LIVE UNITED CENTRAL OHIO
